publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2435# Michael Matheson: European Day of Disabled People: 3 December 2001â€”That the Parliament notes the European Day of Disabled People on 3 December 2001; recognises the contribution made by people with disabilities to Scottish society; further notes with concern the continuing exclusion of disabled people from full participation within our society due to barriers created by poor design and inaccessible buildings in towns and cities across Scotland, and supports the principle of "Design for All" by asking the Holyrood Progress Group to ensure that the new Parliament building at Holyrood is accessible to all. Supported by: Bruce Crawford*, Fergus Ewing*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*

S1M-2435# European Day of Disabled People: 3 December 2001 (lodged on 12 November 2001) Robert Brown*, Colin Campbell*, Brian Adam*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Ms Sandra White*, Andrew Wilson*, Shona Robison*

S1M-2435# European Day of Disabled People: 3 December 2001 (lodged on 12 November 2001) Mr Michael McMahon*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Mr Murray Tosh*, Stewart Stevenson*, Nora Radcliffe*, Pauline McNeill*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2435# European Day of Disabled People: 3 December 2001 (lodged on 12 November 2001) Mr George Reid*, Alex Neil*, Michael Russell*

S1M-2435# Michael Matheson: European Day of Disabled People: 3 December 2001-That the Parliament notes the European Day of Disabled People on 3 December 2001; recognises the contribution made by people with disabilities to Scottish society; further notes with concern the continuing exclusion of disabled people from full participation within our society due to barriers created by poor design and inaccessible buildings in towns and cities across Scotland, and supports the principle of "Design for All" by asking the Holyrood Progress Group to ensure that the new Parliament building at Holyrood is accessible to all. Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Fergus Ewing, Richard Lochhead, Mr Andrew Welsh, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Robert Brown, Colin Campbell, Brian Adam, Roseanna Cunningham, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr Gil Paterson, Ms Sandra White, Andrew Wilson, Shona Robison, Mr Michael McMahon, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Mr Murray Tosh, Stewart Stevenson, Nora Radcliffe, Pauline McNeill, Fiona McLeod, Mr George Reid, Alex Neil, Michael Russell, Robin Harper*, Irene McGugan*
S1M-2435# European Day of Disabled People: 3 December 2001 (lodged on 12 November 2001) Christine Grahame*
S1M-2435# European Day of Disabled People: 3 December 2001 (lodged on 12 November 2001) Fiona Hyslop*, Tricia Marwick*, Margaret Jamieson*, Bill Butler*
S1M-2435# European Day of Disabled People: 3 December 2001 (lodged on 12 November 2001) Kay Ullrich*
S1M-2435# European Day of Disabled People: 3 December 2001 (lodged on 12 November 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-2435# European Day of Disabled People: 3 December 2001 (lodged on 12 November 2001) Dr Sylvia Jackson*
S1M-2435# European Day of Disabled People: 3 December 2001 (lodged on 12 November 2001) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-2435# European Day of Disabled People: 3 December 2001 (lodged on 12 November 2001) Dennis Canavan*
S1M-2435# European Day of Disabled People: 3 December 2001 (lodged on 12 November 2001) Rhoda Grant*
S1M-2435# European Day of Disabled People: 3 December 2001 (lodged on 12 November 2001) Cathy Peattie*
